help.title: help center
help.desc: For us, Fika users are the highest priority. The users need to feel that they have joined a safe and secure environment, and felt 100% comfortable using Fika. If you don’t feel safe using the app, or just experiencing an error, send us an email or chat with us here to let our support team know.

press.title: PRESS OR SPONSORSHIP ENQUIRIES
press.desc: If you have any idea of how we can work together, feel free to contact us via email or mobile. We’d love to talk to you!

ask.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
ask.desc: Need to know how the app works? Check it right here.
